sentences.en: I developed serious arthritic symptoms and chronic sinusitis.
sentences.cn: 我有了严重的关节炎症状和慢性鼻窦炎。

sentences.en: I've found that my handwork with yarn has helped my arthritic fingers remain more dexterous as I age.
sentences.cn: 我发现，随着年龄的增长，我用纱线做手工使患有关节炎的手指变得更加灵活了。

sentences.en: Defectors have described him as arthritic and illiterate.
sentences.cn: 反对者则把他说成是关节炎患者和文盲。
